item.description:
I've wanted to try this place for a while and many members have asked that we go for their weekend brunch. They have live jazz during brunch, which will make for a great afternoon. I'm looking forward to it!


From Boston Magazine:

"Make a beeline for The Beehive in Boston's South End on Saturdays and
Sundays from 10:30 a.m.-3 p.m. for "The Beehive Brunch." Try one of
their many house specialties, including the Luxe Grilled Cheese with
Shortrib and Fontina Cheese, Homemade Granola with Greek Yogurt and
almonds, or the Eggs Shakshuka, which is three eggs baked over North
African style tomato sauce served with creamy polenta. Dishes range
from $5 to $20 and there's always live music ranging from jazz, latin,
gospel and more."

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Jazz Brunch at Beehive
